video.title: Divesting from Rainbow Bookshelves
video.html: Rat queen yells at you about the order in which those paper sandwiches are arranged on the tree plates. The title of this video is from a radio series called Divesting From People Pleasing by The Heart (which used to be my favourite podcast but Iâ€™ve aggressively disliked it since new people have taken over); the concept of recognising a pattern in yourself which is historically alluring and normalised but ultimately destructive, and then consciously separating yourself from it.
